author: cms-btv-pog
body: Following discussion in the RECO/AT meeting on May 8, 2014 (https://indico.cern.ch/event/317592/#2014-05-08), this PR replaces runtime cms::Exception calls with edm::LogError calls in the jet flavour code
title: Replacing runtime cms::Exception calls with edm::LogError calls in the jet flavour code
